mapper.select: SELECT STATS_CLSF AS clsf , STATS_KEY AS key , CNT_LIKE AS cntLike , CNT_BRWS AS cntBrws , CNT_SHAR AS cntShar FROM TB_DP_SOCIAL_STATS WHERE 1=1 AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATS_CLSF = #{clsf, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATS_KEY = #{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO TB_DP_SOCIAL_STATS USING DUAL ON ( 1=1 AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATS_CLSF = #{clsf, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATS_KEY = #{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CNT_LIKE = CNT_LIKE + 1 CNT_SHAR = CNT_SHAR + 1 CNT_BRWS = CNT_BRWS + 1 , UPD_ID = 'SAC' , UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (TENANT_ID, STATS_CLSF, STATS_KEY, CNT_LIKE, CNT_SHAR, CNT_BRWS, REG_DT, REG_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_ID) VALUES ( #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{clsf, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 1, 0, 0 , 0, 1, 0 , 0, 0, 1 , SYSDATE , 'SAC' , SYSDATE , 'SAC' )
